Reviews.Title: “Great bar, dreary rooms, fantastic location.”
Reviews.Author: masonfamily99
Reviews.Content: booked hotel reading reviews primarily location close central station bar friendly meet locals travellers alike attic ensuite yes stairs steep narrow unusual amsterdam especially decent size short stay stayed 4 nights reasonably clean dark dreary painted strange shade green choice people cheap compared hotels fifties managed stairs noisy friday saturday night wasnt bad couldnt sleep stay yes probably

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: booked hotel knowing loud centre arrived 1030am werent able check afternoon owners leave trolley bag near bar walked lunch hotel beer checked 1pm 32 superior jacuzzi bath top floor steps steep hotel excellent value money heart definitely stay thanks

Reviews.Title: “More than expected”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: ideal basic hotelwe stayed 1 night 55 eurothe owners staff welcoming friendlythe basic fine 1 bathroom lovely clean plenty roomlocation 5 min walk central night supply ear plugs warned steps steep definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Short Stay”
Reviews.Author: Fifer1903 Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: central helpful clean short staygreat traditional bar minus bea steep staircase leading unsuitable mobility due location fair bit external hotel thoughtfully provided earplugs

Reviews.Title: “Good little hotel !”
Reviews.Author: Hayley D
Reviews.Content: hotel complete luxury clean simple comforatble staff friendly welcoming bar cosy traditional careful stairs typically steep facing buzzing centre amsterdam sleeps sometimes little loud trying sleep 5am own fault amsterdam dance event perfect little hotel travellers wish spend lot lot worse

Reviews.Title: “OK for 1 or 2 nights”
Reviews.Author: akimaki
Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located near central station city center bar noisy leat 3am weekdays ran recommend hotel amsterdam partying price low compared hotels worth value dont expect

Reviews.Title: “Much room for improvement”
Reviews.Author: Belfasttravellers
Reviews.Content: eleventh trip amsterdam weâ€™ve stayed variety hotels familiar hospitality standards amsterdam travelled partner friends stayed top floor hotel nights ensuite â€“ jacuzzi bath read positive reviews hotel looking forward visit hotel marketed wasnâ€™t expecting hot running water shower someplace comfortable sleep unfortunately hotel offered none paid extra ensuite couldnâ€™t taps filled shower head nearly time eventually filled hotel manager told leaking downstairs night hot water mornings hotel manager told wait 20 minutes try hot water showers evening night times feel desperate repair furniture worn tatty chairs broken curtains fallen onto string carpet seen days double bed similar stored home set wooden box mattress top wasnâ€™t comfortable positive smoking allowed hotel manager cleaning lady pleasant welcoming bar downstairs cosy dutch feel itâ€™s location five minutes railway station coffeeshops hotel spend little money redecoration repair sorted plumbing little gem unfortunately

Reviews.Title: “Loved the hotel, didn't love the noise”
Reviews.Author: travelnut718
Reviews.Content: loved hotel staff etc clean mellow staff cute bar convenient plan amsterdam strictly party perfect walking distance train station heart red light district unfortunately noise red light district amsterdam hopefully gorgeous city probably stay based location otherwise totally recommend backpackers party animals

Reviews.Title: “deffinately my hotel of choice for futuretrips to amsterdam - perfect!!”
Reviews.Author: spookyali
Reviews.Content: hotel olde worlde pub feel warm reception staff serving nice selection beers pace start attack amsterdam stairs steep worth climb weve stayed 11 trips fantastic city worth paying little extra jacuzzi lovely hotel highly recomended return feburary

Reviews.Title: “Budget hotel in Amsterdam with great location”
Reviews.Author: Rob S
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 2 nights hotel midseptember 2010 size contained bed sink wardrobe desk cleanliness bathroom clean smoking allowed definite strong marijuana odor 2nd story nice leave windows air bathroom bedroom sink mirror single shared toilet floor own wc shared shower own shower shower multiple people fit save time shower lockable basically showering private water pressure plenty warm water location hotel location bar maybe 5minute walk main train station 30minutes lost pay attention hotel edge red light district shown red lights pop ground front hotel night public transportation amsterdam walked anne frank house van gogh museum etc roughly 30minutes miscellaneous stairs steep vertical hotel bar check bartender nice annoying alarm beep hallway time exit night bathroom free wifi easy spot hang clothesline doing laundry sink noise below expected bad summary recommend hotel budgetminded travelers clean convenientlylocated amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “convenient and welcoming - all you need in amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: noplacelikehome05
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel june time amsterdam hotel conveniently located base explore amsterdams tourist sites including red light district short walk trainbus terminal easy staff friendly welcoming helping tourist maps etc basic accommodation secure amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Good location, average hotel”
Reviews.Author: RustyCatLeeds
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 1 night travelling music festival 200 miles south amsterdam location excellent corner red light district close lots bars coffee shops youre walking distance attractions apart museum district hotel hed night fine attic decent size bit dump expect pay â£50 80 euros bit cheap amsterdam suppose youre fussy hotel sleep shower hotel youit probably value money amsterdam standards defintiely expensive

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff, Great Location, Good fun - Adapt & enjoy the differences.”
Reviews.Author: casagodfrey
Reviews.Content: days amsterdam spot bar staff customer base stairs typical central amsterdam experience difference enjoy ensuite quirky layout cleaned day swipe card access swipe card access accomodation via separate street door preferred security camera base magnificently staircase regard reviewers comments staircase screwed leg coped little difficulty lots couples late third trip amsterdam 10 doubt return bars restaurants doorstep boat trips canal bus trains 5 minutes walk loved lively happy atmosphere wife provided ear plugs inhouse acoustics narrow streets nor friends bit precious whine normal adjusted traveller smile enjoy

Reviews.Title: “Great service, great price, clean, awesome location!”
Reviews.Author: mysfyt066
Reviews.Content: entire staff hotel pub extremely helpful friendly helped sort trams locals pub main street red light include ear plugs help clean beds comfortable amsterdam sleep wrong pub floor nice meeting friends drinks heading city orange juice delicious location stayed amsterdam staying time literally 5 minute walk central station coffee shop corner canals shops surrounding amsterdam time stay heart book
